conclusion: Analyze paths from points A, B, and C through baffles to containers D and E.
Liquid starts at point A and encounters the orange baffle.
Orange baffle is angled downward to the right, directing liquid towards the right side.
Liquid encounters the white baffle, which is angled downward to the left.
White baffle directs liquid towards the left side.
Liquid from A flows into container D.
Liquid starts at point B and encounters the pink baffle.
Pink baffle is angled downward to the left, directing liquid towards the left side.
Liquid encounters the purple baffle, which is angled downward to the right.
Purple baffle directs liquid towards the right side.
Liquid from B flows into container D.
Liquid starts at point C and encounters the cyan baffle.
Cyan baffle is angled downward to the left, directing liquid towards the left side.
Liquid encounters the yellow baffle, which is angled downward to the right.
Yellow baffle directs liquid towards the right side.
Liquid from C flows into container E.
Final Answer: Liquid from A flows into container D, liquid from B flows into container D, liquid from C flows into container E.
